The Second edition of GTA SA has the Sex mini game removed from the game, unlike the original that had the mini game on it already, but just disabled for lower game ratings. All this mod dose is unlock the explicit content of the first version of the game. The mod can't unlock this content on the second edition, because its simply not there.
